text: I’ve tried so many otah buns before but nothing beats this!! Their otah is spicy enough (even my parents approved of this) and each otah bun is filled with chunks of fish!! Even though they do not specialise in buns, their white and pandan buns are so soft and fluffy!! These otah buns make such a good breakfast/snack option!!! Highly highly recommended!!! Please try it for yourself 😍👌🏼👍🏼

I’ve been eating their Otah since pandemic, still loving it. My family and friends love their Otah buns, crispy Otah and even just the Otah alone.
The Otah is incredibly flavorful, with a perfect blend of spices that complements the rich, savory taste of the fish. The seasoning is well balanced and spiciness just nice. If you love Otah, you must try Otah from Song luck yummy!
Spicy traditional otah, can really taste mackerel chunks. BEST OTAH BUN!! Bun is soft like baby ass, otah is fresh! Lovely texture, taste and everything you think of. HIGHLY recommended!

Favourite otah and probably the best I’ve eaten yet! Right amount of spice and fragrance, nothing like the others I’ve ever eaten elsewhere. My go to whenever I crave for otah. Need to try, even their buns are amazing.

My must go otah for lasksa and nasi lemak . The otah paste with lot of mackerel fish in it which is fresh and juicy .  Very tender and smooth compare to most of other vendor .
Otah bun too is also delicious !!!
Fantastic recipe . 😋😋😋
